TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ElementHost extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializer("WindowsFormsIntegration.Design.ElementHostCodeDomSerializer, WindowsFormsIntegration.Design, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer, System.Design, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: A Windows Forms control that can be used to host a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) element.

span.span: A Windows Forms control that can be used to host a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用控件中放置[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]上你[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]控件或窗体。Use the control to place a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] on your [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control or form. 到主机[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]控制[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素中使用元素。To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, use the element. > [!NOTE] > 使用安装 WindowsFormsIntegration.dll[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]程序集。WindowsFormsIntegration.dll is installed with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] assemblies. 程序集的默认位置为 %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll。The default location for the assembly is %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll. 到主机[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]Windows 窗体中的元素，必须将分配[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素属性。To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a Windows Form, you must assign the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element to the property. 使用属性分配自定义映射之间控制和其托管[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素。Use the property to assign custom mappings between an control and its hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体和 WPF 属性映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件来承载[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 承载 3-D WPF 复合控件在 Windows 窗体中](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting a 3-D WPF Composite Control in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md). [!code-csharp[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/CSharp/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/VisualBasic/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.vb#11)]

The default is .

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted element has a transparent background.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted element has a transparent background.

value.span: 如果承载的元素具有透明背景;否则为。

span.span: if the hosted element has a transparent background; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使位图复制，这使得承载的元素为将通过宿主容器的透明度。The property enables bitmap copying, which enables hosted elements to use transparency over the host container. 这可通过映像或渐变背景的元素是。This is useful when the element is over an image or gradient background. 出于性能原因，属性处于关闭状态默认情况下。For performance reasons, the property is turned off by default.

summary.span: Gets or sets the hosted by the control.

span.span: Gets or sets the hosted by the control.
The hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以托管只有一个元素，但可以有任意数量的子元素。Only one element can be hosted, but can have any number of child elements. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性分配一个承载[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to assign a hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 承载 3-D WPF 复合控件在 Windows 窗体中](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting a 3-D WPF Composite Control in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md). [!code-csharp[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/CSharp/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/VisualBasic/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: Immediately frees any system resources used by the control.

span.span: Immediately frees any system resources used by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次调用由其他对象。重写时小心不要引用已经释放的早期调用中的对象。详细了解如何实现，请参阅 [实现 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。有关详细信息并，请参阅 [清理了非托管 Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void EnableModelessKeyboardInterop(class System.Windows.Window window) cil managed

param.name: window
param.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] window to be opened modelessly.

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] window to be opened modelessly.

summary.span: Enables a to receive keyboard messages correctly when it is opened modelessly from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)].

span.span: Enables a to receive keyboard messages correctly when it is opened modelessly from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法，以转发所有键盘消息时[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]以无模式方式打开窗口。Call the method to forward all keyboard messages when a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] window is opened modelessly. 方法安装中的消息筛选器[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-基于应用程序。The method installs a message filter in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application. 无模式窗口处于活动状态时，筛选器将所有键盘消息都转发。The filter forwards all keyboard messages when the modeless window is active.

summary.span: Gets the parent container of the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

span.span: Gets the parent container of the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
The parent container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 宿主容器是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ，这是承载的元素的父容器。The host container is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] , which is the parent container for the hosted element. 宿主容器的根目录下始终是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素层次结构。The host container is always at the root of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element hierarchy. 若要访问承载的元素的父级，访问直接。To access the parent of the hosted element, access directly.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnEnabledChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnEnabledChanged (e As EventArgs)

param.name: e
param.span: The data for the event.

span.span: The data for the event.

summary.span: Raises the event.

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnPaint(class System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs e) cil managed

param.name: e
param.span: A that contains the event data.

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: Raises the event.

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的实现方法将转发到基类实现。The implementation of the method forwards to the base class implementation.

span.para: 不会重写的这一实现方法。控件管理其承载的元素的绘制和重写将导致不可预知的结果。
Do not override this implementation of the method. The control manages the painting of its hosted element, and overriding will cause unpredictable results.

summary.span: Paints the background of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法绘制到屏幕外 HBITMAP 父控件的背景。The method paints the parent control's background into an offscreen HBITMAP. 此位图作为背景中承载的元素用于支持透明度。This bitmap is used as the background in the hosted element to support transparency. 此方法支持 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] 基础结构，不能在代码中直接使用。This method supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

Protected Overrides Function ProcessCmdKey (ByRef msg As Message, keyData As Keys) As Boolean
protected: override bool ProcessCmdKey(System::Windows::Forms::Message % msg, System::Windows::Forms::Keys keyData);

param.name: msg
param.span: A , passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.

span.span: A , passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.

param.name: keyData
param.span: One of the values representing the key to process.

span.span: One of the values representing the key to process.

summary.span: Processes a command key, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the command before normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] processing.

span.span: Processes a command key, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the command before normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] processing.

returns.span: if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, .

span.span: if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未处理键消息所承载的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素，它转发向上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]类层次结构进行处理。If a key message is not handled by the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, it is forwarded up the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] class hierarchy for processing.

permission.span: 对于直接调用方的完全信任。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未处理键消息所承载的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素，它转发向上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]类层次结构进行处理。If a key message is not handled by the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, it is forwarded up the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] class hierarchy for processing.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PropertyMap As PropertyMap

summary.span: Gets the property map, which determines how setting properties on the control affects the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

span.span: Gets the property map, which determines how setting properties on the control affects the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

value.span: 一个，它映射到上所承载的属性 [！INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 元素。

span.span: A that maps to properties on the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]技术有两个相似但不同属性模型。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies have two similar but different property models. *属性映射*支持两种体系结构之间的互操作。*Property mapping* supports interoperation between the two architectures. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体和 WPF 属性映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来转换属性的一个承载[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to translate the property for a hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 使用 ElementHost 控件映射属性](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-mapping-properties-using-the-elementhost-control.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Mapping Properties Using the ElementHost Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-mapping-properties-using-the-elementhost-control.md). [!code-csharp[PropertyMappingWithElementHost#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/CSharp/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/Form1.cs#12)] [!code-vb[PropertyMappingWithElementHost#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/VisualBasic/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/Form1.vb#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Select (bool directed, bool forward);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Select(bool directed, bool forward) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Select (directed As Boolean, forward As Boolean)
protected: override void Select(bool directed, bool forward);

param.name: directed
param.span: to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, .

span.span: to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, .

param.name: forward
param.span: to move forward in the tab order; to move backward in the tab order.

span.span: to move forward in the tab order; to move backward in the tab order.

summary.span: Activates the hosted element.

span.span: Activates the hosted element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法激活承载的元素。The method activates the hosted element. 如果存在多个承载的元素，第一个或最后一个元素已激活，具体取决于`directed`和`forward`参数。If more than one hosted element exists, either the first or last element is activated, depending on the `directed` and `forward` parameters. 重复调用方法不会遍历承载的元素。Repeated calls to the method do not traverse the hosted elements. 若要选择后续元素，调用方法属性。To select subsequent elements, call the method on the property. 此实现将转发的 tab 键[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]。This implementation forwards tab keys from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)].
